title: RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > Prerequisites > What Do You Need? > RAK Hotspot Hardware Components and Warnings
content:
1. [**RAK Hotspot**](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/rak-hotspot-miner?utm_source=RAKHotspotMiner&utm_medium=Document&utm_campaign=BuyFromStore)
2. 32GB microSD Card (included) + Card Reader
3. USB Type-C Power Adapter (included)  
> **WARNING:** The SIM card slot of the cellular versions is not hot-swappable. Make sure the gateway is switched off before inserting or ejecting the SIM card.
parent_content:
1. [**RAK Hotspot**](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/rak-hotspot-miner?utm_source=RAKHotspotMiner&utm_medium=Document&utm_campaign=BuyFromStore)
2. 32GB microSD Card (included) + Card Reader
3. USB Type-C Power Adapter (included)  
> **WARNING:** The SIM card slot of the cellular versions is not hot-swappable. Make sure the gateway is switched off before inserting or ejecting the SIM card.

title: RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Antenna Mounting Scenarios and Connectivity Chain Guide
content: For Antenna Mounting Scenarios and proper connectivity chain, refer to this [guide](troubleshooting#proper-connection-scenarios-with-the-rak-outdoor-enclosureantennas).
parent_content: For Antenna Mounting Scenarios and proper connectivity chain, refer to this [guide](troubleshooting#proper-connection-scenarios-with-the-rak-outdoor-enclosureantennas).

title: RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Download the Helium App > Download Helium Hotspot App for Android and iOS
content:
The application is available for both Android and iOS. You can manually search it or just scan the QR Code provided below:
* [**Android**](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.helium.wallet)
* [**iOS:**](https://apps.apple.com/ph/app/helium-hotspot/id1450463605)  
> **Image:** QR Codes  
> **Image:** iOS and Android App
parent_content:
The application is available for both Android and iOS. You can manually search it or just scan the QR Code provided below:
* [**Android**](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.helium.wallet)
* [**iOS:**](https://apps.apple.com/ph/app/helium-hotspot/id1450463605)

title: RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Power on the RAK Hotspot > RAK Hotspot Initial Setup Guidelines
content:
> **WARNING:** Before powering on, the best advice to follow the guidelines below to avoid damaging the RAK Hotspot. Familiarize the interfaces of the product as shown in the  [Interfaces](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisgate/rak-hotspot/datasheet/#interfaces) section of the RAK Hotspot Datasheet.  
1. Attach the LoRa Antenna.
parent_content:
> **WARNING:** Before powering on, the best advice to follow the guidelines below to avoid damaging the RAK Hotspot. Familiarize the interfaces of the product as shown in the  [Interfaces](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisgate/rak-hotspot/datasheet/#interfaces) section of the RAK Hotspot Datasheet.  
1. Attach the LoRa Antenna.  
2. When you are ready to setup your RAK Hotspot, plug in and connect the included power supply to the USB-C port on the RAK Hotspot. After 30 seconds, the device should be ready to configure via the app.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
From powering up the device, you only have 5 minutes to complete the setup. After 5 minutes, the app will no longer pair with the RAK Hotspot. In that case, you need to turn it off and turn it back on to try again.

title: RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Power on the RAK Hotspot > Account Security > Account Recovery or Transfer Using 12-Word Phrase
content:
During the setup of your account, you will be asked to input 12 words that must be used in order to recover or move accounts between phones.  
> **Image:** Account recovery or transfer keywords
parent_content:
During the setup of your account, you will be asked to input 12 words that must be used in order to recover or move accounts between phones.  
> **Image:** Account recovery or transfer keywords

title: RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > RAK Hotspot Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Backup your microSD Card > Backup Your RAK Hotspot microSD Card
content:
Backing up your microSD Card is very important as this contains your RAK Hotspot identity. If the card is lost or damaged, you may lose access to the Helium network, and require payment of a new add gateway fee. **Keep this backup card in a safe place**.  
You should only backup after adding the hotspot to your Helium account, and ideally once it has fully synced.  
To backup, power off the RAK Hotspot and follow [backup instructions](backup).
parent_content:
Backing up your microSD Card is very important as this contains your RAK Hotspot identity. If the card is lost or damaged, you may lose access to the Helium network, and require payment of a new add gateway fee. **Keep this backup card in a safe place**.  
You should only backup after adding the hotspot to your Helium account, and ideally once it has fully synced.  
To backup, power off the RAK Hotspot and follow [backup instructions](backup).
